desc: We are expanding our online job community and seek a full-time Sales Development Representative to help lead the charge. This is an opportunity for someone who wants to learn the fundamentals of sales within a social enterprise that is transforming how local people find local jobs.You'll work alongside our head of sales, who used to work for Amazon Local and Yelp. As the second member of the sales team, you’ll be given a huge amount of responsibility and the opportunity to grow as a salesperson within a fast-growing startup. We have a large footprint in the San Francisco Bay Area and just entered the Chicago region, so we could really use a hand!To see who you’ll be working with, click here: [url removed, login to view]To learn more about what it’s like to work at Localwise, click here: [url removed, login to view]--Requirements:— Support the head of sales, including but not limited to developing target lists, contacting and qualifying leads, creating tactical sales campaigns, and updating account data in HubSpot CRM— Comfort speaking to local hiring managers by phone and email for the majority of the day— Generate sales qualified opportunities to achieve revenue targets— Build a reputation and network within the small business community in San Francisco and Chicago (at first)--Qualifications:— 4-year bachelor’s degree, preferred— 0-2 years professional experience— Self-motivated -- ability to hit the ground running in prospecting, managing, and qualifying employers— Great interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills— Incredible attention to detail and work ethic— Desire to build the next great startup from the ground up (this isn’t for everyone as it takes a TON of commitment!)— Willing to work extended hours alongside a committed team--Compensation— Base salary + commissionThe ideal candidate is passionate about helping local businesses hire local talent, a great communicator, and a crazy hustler. Send resume + brief note of interest.Thank you!
title: Sales Development Representative - Work from Home

desc: Region Sale Executive , Business DevelopmentWe are looking for a region sale executive/manager , Business Development .We are a company based in Malaysia and we would like to accept applications for the position of sales manager or executive for sales in Malaysia and overseas. Most often than not, we would be dealing in the sale of the properties , Course Training  n health product  in some other country ( We are  selling  international example like Singapore , Philippines, Malaysia, Thailand, indonesia, United Kingdom, United States  …. etc )Our company is looking out for experts who believe that they have the ability to sell of properties , Course Training n health product easily and effectively for us. Basically, we are looking for someone who will be able to generate business for our company. Business Development And SaleIf you are in individual living in Malaysia or any other country and you have contacts that have contact or connection with High Net worth Investors and can invest in real estate properties , corporate Company , HR , then you are exactly the person that we are looking for. People with contacts in higher places would be preferred.It is not necessary that the real estate , Course training n health product  be sold only to the residents of Malaysia because we are also looking for investors living in another country. As long as they are willing to buy real estate, we are ready to do business with them. As a sales manager or executive , business development , you should be in the position to generate not just leads but also sales.Here are some of the requirements that we are looking for in the potential candidates:•	You should have a very good idea about how the real estate , Course training   n  health product industry works and prior experience .•	Researching is a task that you should excel in because our company deals in conducting researches regularly.•	You should be able to manage your marketing strategy in your country.•	Online marketing is something that you will need to know and undertake.•	You should have the ability to look for potential buyers of real estate , Course training   n  health product.•	You need to be innovative and self-driven.•	It is important you have keen interest in business and property sales , Course training n health product.•	You need to possess very good communication skills; be it written, oral or listening.As a sales manager, here are some of the tasks that you will have to carry out:•	Get in touch with the potential buyers and talk to them about the project, Course training n health product•	Look for potential buyers.•	Create and execute as well as manage project marketing strategies such as direct marketing, presentation of customer profile, hosting seminars and exhibitions.•	Create good relationships with groups offering other professional services.•	To obtain revenue goals.•	To supervise the sales team members in sales agency mandates.•	To start and carry out marketing and sales activities.•	To identify new business prospects and to obtain target sales.•	To create and maintain a database with the name and contact information of present and potential clients.As our company international sales manager / sale executive , business development, it will be your responsibility to recognize as well as develop new business accounts. Here are the main responsibilities that you will be having:•	It is necessary that you are always looking out for new business opportunities.•	To obtain the sales target that the management has set.•	To generate as well as manage the business accounts of our clients.•	To create and implement marketing plans and sales plans.•	To ensure that a good relationship is created with clients by concentrating on our company’s growth, new prospects and profitability.•	To come up with business plans and reports.And also let me know the expected price .
title: Region Sale Executive / Manager Wanted   -- 84539

desc: Seeking highly motivated, self-starting Telemarketers/Appointment Setters with excellent prospecting and communication skills to make 100+ calls every day, schedule at least 1-2 appointments per day with corporate executives at top U.S. financial institutions, and convert our database of leads to clients. This is a very hardcore and intense phone role. If you can’t handle 8 hours a day on the phone, please do not apply. If you are not comfortable talking and selling on the telephone, please do not apply.  If you can handle it, we’ll give you all the tools and support for success.We’re a global Business Consulting firm specializing in the financial services industry. No prior experience is required, but understanding our business model and value proposition will be crucial in executing effective calls, identifying cross-selling opportunities, and closing appointments.  This position affords the successful candidate an exciting opportunity to be a Telemarketer in a growing company and earn appointment setting bonuses (between $150-$300 U.S. dollars), commissions on sales (we pay 5% on the net sale).  This is a great way to gain something besides money - i.e. learn about U.S. financial companies; as well as an opportunity to work closely with some of the brightest minds on Wall Street in an informal work environment where collegiality and intellectual rigor are highly valued.We’re prepared to make a substantial investment in you. We will guarantee $120 to $200 a week (we do not take taxes out) and require a quota of 5-10 appointments per week.  For scheduling 3 sales calls in one day that are verified and completed appointments, we will pay a bonus of $150 to you.  For scheduling 5 sales calls in one day that are verified and completed appointments, we will pay a bonus of $300 to you.  We will also pay a uncapped bonus of 5% on the net sale.  Our sales are HUGE range from $10K to $250K, with the average sale being around $30K.  For those that work hard and succeed, you can expect to earn at least $7,500 per year.  You’ve got to be hungry and ambitious. You've got to be flexible and easily trainable. You’ve got to be mature and reliable. We’ll need you to work 8:00 a.m. – 5:00 p.m., Monday through Friday.Compensation: For those that work hard and succeed, you can expect to earn at least $7,500 per year.   Below are the details of the compensation plan.•	$3.00 to $5.00 U.S, dollars per hour depending on experience.•	Unlimited appointment setting bonuses of $150 U.S, dollars for 3 sales calls per day.  You should expect to receive at least 1 appointment setting bonus per month.•	Unlimited appointment setting bonuses of $300 U.S, dollars for 5 sales calls per day.•	Sales commissions of 5% of the net sale when appointments turn into sales.  Our sales are HUGE range from $10K to $250K, with the average sale being around $30K.•	Special bonuses for performing exceptional work.Job Requirements:In order to be successful making appointments in this position, the candidate must:•	Have prior experience in appointment setting•	Have a good working computer•	Have a reliable high speed Internet connection•	Excellent spoken and written English skills•	Make 100+ cold calls/follow up calls per day•	Schedule 1 to 2 appointments consistently per day•	Make 1 sale within the first 2 months.  After the first 2 months, make one to 1-2 sales on a monthly basis•	Be confident and “talented” on the telephone•	Be highly motivated, aggressive, and self-starting•	Execute on our proven sales methodologies, e.g. bypassing gatekeepers and giving rebuttals•	Build a pipeline•	Work Monday to Friday, 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. Eastern time•	Experience in using a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) system such as Salesforce is a plusSend your proposal/resume and we'll call you for an interview if there's a match.
title: Hire a Telemarketer/Appointment Setter.

desc: We are looking for a results-driven Telemarketer to promote our products and help our clients by answering requests in a fast-paced environment. You will be responsible for influencing existing or potential customers.Responsibilities•	Call potential clients utilizing our generated leads•	Use scripts to provide information about our services and how we can help them.•	Ask pertinent questions to understand the client’s requirements•	Record the client’s personal information accurately in our client database.•	Deal with complaints or doubts to safeguard the company’s reputation•	Go the “extra mile” to meet goals and facilitate future sales•	Keep records of calls and sales and record useful information in our daily log.About Power Source MarketingWe are rapidly growing customer acquisition company with industrial expertise servicing clients who are major players in the energy sector and are among the top fortune 500 companies.Get yourself in to make money in a trillion-dollar industry and generate a source of income from it all from the comfort of your home. The time has never been better!
title: Telemarket for me

desc: We sell Natural and Organic and USA made branded Shampoo / Soaps / Vitamins / Supplements / and other Health and Beauty Products.We Need English / Chinese Speaking individual to follow up on sales leads. One time project approximately 3 hours. Pays $30If you are able to get these leads to buy, you will be paid a 5% commission from Net Profit. If the follow up takes more then 3 hours, additional hourly pay will be paid at $8.00 per hour. If you are able to get your own leads to sell our Products, we will pay you commission of 10% from Net Profit but no hourly pay.When bidding: Please indicate if you are interested in both.. The 3 hour Paid Project as well as ongoing commission only Sales Lead project.Bids with No proposal will be Ignored.
title: English to Chinese and Mandarin Translator

desc: We have been successfully running our Fantasy Cricket app for the past 1 year. We would like to grow our user base through Referral and Affiliate Marketing now.We will share unique referral link for you. You need to share this link in various sites, blogs and social media. When a user clicks this link and installs the app, the user will be linked to your account. Your payment will be based on your referral's spending in the app. So if you refer good quality users, you will get high payment. You will get flat 10% commission of what the user spends in the app.Eg. payment:If you refer 100 users and each user spends 100 Rupees in the app in their first 30 days, you will get 1000 rupees. There is no limit on the number of users you can refer. The more the better.We can also offer payment for just sign up once we are comfortable with your work. Otherwise, we will have lots of spam signups.Bidders should:- Have prior experience with Affiliate Marketing, Link Submission and Referral- Have good networking skills and contacts in other sites- Be active in Social Media and has many influencer accounts- Be available & responsive over email/chatYou need to:- Target users from India as this app is primarily for India based users- Focus on people who can spend money online (through Paytm, Freecharge, Netbanking and Debit/Credit cards)- Focus on Android users. Since the app is built only for Android. We also have a web app at [url removed, login to view] but still the Android app is betterYour work will be monitored based on when the link is clicked and how many users install the app from your link. If you can refer more than 100 users, we will share necessary data to track your progress and your referral's activitiesYou can check our Android app at [url removed, login to view] or our web app at [url removed, login to view] Get yourself familiarized with the app, so you can share it with proper message.
title: Need several Marketing Freelancers for Affiliate Marketing and Link Sharing: Commission based payment

desc: NTA SCOPE OF WORK:NTA is a NGO personal project with no product being sold on it. The theme of the macro theme of the website is to provide visitors information on how to increase peace in their life through the areas of Spirituality, Music, and Yoga.NTA will integrate elements such as Contact info, blog/s (with search and category functions), free Chat, Registration for newsletter and blog updates, and if possible a function to send WhatsApp messages to those registered with mobile numbers online or as provided by us.NTA, will host links to contents such as facebook/ other online available videos, web pages, and will need to have social media integrated into it.  NTA will be viewed across screen sizes and desktop, tablets, mobile devices.AdWords and other such revenue generation, through ads appearing on NTA is a must. SEO and other value adds are welcomed but not critical to NTA.Minimal cost and time are the key factors that will determine project sanction.Currently the domain name is registered and a hosting package purchased including 100 GB storage and 20+ databases made available. WordPress 8.4.1 has been installed and the domain hosting offers many free apps such as as chat, SEO, analytics, ecommerce to be installed for NTA.Only serious, committed, experienced, freelancers need submit.
